analysis.description:
Validus.annualInterest (/unique_chucks/43/0xa03f32b4db3c599e82034b0d392c63224bbf4152.sol#216-226) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- (_now.sub(stakeStartTime)).div(31536000) == 0
	- (_now.sub(stakeStartTime)).div(31536000) == 1

Validus.annualInterest (/unique_chucks/43/0xa03f32b4db3c599e82034b0d392c63224bbf4152.sol#216-226) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- (_now.sub(stakeStartTime)).div(31536000) == 0
	- (_now.sub(stakeStartTime)).div(31536000) == 1
Validus.getProofOfStakeReward (/unique_chucks/43/0xa03f32b4db3c599e82034b0d392c63224bbf4152.sol#226-246) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- (_now.sub(stakeStartTime)).div(31536000) == 0
	- (_now.sub(stakeStartTime)).div(31536000) == 1
